texts.es:
Leonarda, tiene 35 años de edad y tiene un hijo, ella vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real distrito de Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Leonarda es trabajadora y emprendedora busca el bienestar de su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de leche y queso. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Leonarda en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar leche para hacer ricos quesos andinos. 

Leonarda pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Leonarda is 35 years old and has a son.  She lives in the Tambo Real community in the district of Anta, department of Cusco.  She is a hard-working, enterprising woman who seeks a comfortable lifestyle for her family.  She has been selling milk and cheese for several years and this business is doing well thanks to her hard work.  Leonarda is in need of a loan to buy milk to make rich Andean cheese.

She is a member of the "San Bartolomé de Tambo Real" communal bank which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is grateful for this opportunity and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy milk to make rich Andean cheese

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es:
Sebastiana, tiene 52 años D. edad y tiene tres hijos, ella vive en la comunidad D. Tambo Real distrito D. Anta del departamento del Cusco. En la comunidad que Sebastiana en que vive la  gente se dedica a la agricutlura y ganadería desD. anteaños y se podría decir desD. niños. Sebastiana  no es la excepción pues ella se dedica a la venta D. leche y a la producción D. lácteos y sus derivados. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Sebastiana en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumo para preparas más quesos. 

Sebastiana pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé D. Tambo Real” D. la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Sebastiana is 52 years old and has three children.  She lives in the Tambo Real community in the Anta District, department of Cusco.  The people living in Sebastiana's community have been active in agriculture and livestock farming for a long time; one could even say since they were children.  Sebastiana is not an exception since she sells milk and makes dairy products.  She has been involved in this business for several years and has been successful at it because of her hard work.  Sebastiana is in need of a loan to buy ingredients to make more cheese.

She is a member of the "San Bartolomé D. Tambo Real" communal bank which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is grateful for this opportunity and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make more cheese

loans.name: Fermina

texts.es:
Fermina, tiene 61 años de edad y tiene tres hijos, ella vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real distrito de Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Fermina es trabajadora y emprendedora que busca el bienestar de su familia, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado y también tiene un pequeña tienda de abarrotes. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Fermina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería y para comprar un animal. 

Fermina pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Fermina is 61 years old and has three children.  She lives in the Tambo Real community in the Anta District, department of Cusco.  Fermina is a hard-working, enterprising woman who seeks a comfortable lifestyle for her family.  She buys and sells cattle and also has a small grocery store.  She has been in business for several years and is very successful at it thanks to her hard work.  Fermina is in need of a loan to buy merchandise and livestock.

She is a member of the "San Bartolomé de Tambo Real" communal bank which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is grateful for this opportunity and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and livestock

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, tiene 54 años de edad y tiene dos hijos, ella vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real distrito de Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Rosa es una mujer que busca el bienestar de su familia y aprovecha de las pocas oportunidades que se le presentan en la vida,  ella se dedica a la venta de leche y a la producción de lácteos y derivados. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Rosa en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumo para preparas más productos lácteos como por ejemplo queso.

Rosa pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé de las Casas” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Rosa is 54 years old and has two children.  She lives in the Tambo Real community in the Anta District, department of Cusco.  Rosa is a woman who seeks a comfortable lifestyle for her family, taking advantage of the few opportunities coming her way.  She sells milk and makes dairy products.  She has been in this business for several years and had made it successful thanks to her hard work.  Rosa is in need of a loan to buy ingredients to make dairy products such as cheese.

Rosa is a member of the "San Bartolomé de las Casas" communal bank which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is grateful for this opportunity and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make dairy products such as cheese

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, tiene 23 años de edad, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real distrito de Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Norma es mujer que busca el bienestar de su familia y aprovecha de las pocas oportunidades que se le presentan en la vida,  ella se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, ella produce queso y vende leche. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Norma en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería y para comprar un animal. 

Norma pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma
texts.en:
Norma is 23 years old and has four children.  She lives in the Tambo Real community in the Anta District, department of Cusco.  Norma is a woman who seeks a comfortable lifestyle for her family, taking advantage of the few opportunities coming her way.  She is a livestock farmer and makes and sells cheese and milk.  She has been involved in this activity for several years and has made it successful thanks to her hard work.  Norma is in need of a loan to buy merchandise and livestock.

She is a member of the "San Bartolomé de Tambo Real" communal bank which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is grateful for this opportunity and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and livestock

loans.name: Bailon

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA VICTORIA - CHINCHERO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Bailon; El socio tiene 32 años de edad, el socio  es conviviente; el socio tiene 1 hijo; el socio tiene como principal actividad la artesanía el también tiene terrenos de cultivo en los cuales producen maíz, papa y otros, el socio trabaja en la artesanía desde el año 2008; el socio realiza diseños propios y andinos, el desea que se le otorgue el crédito para poder comprar pintura, oleos, acuarelas, bastidores, aerógrafo y pinceles; el socio trabaja con sus compañeros de banco en la feria artesanal en el poblado de Chinchero. El socio desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de pinturas, oleos, pinceles, aerógrafo y otros.  

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “NUEVA VICTORIA - CHINCHERO” community bank. This bank is located in the district of  Chinchero, province of Urubamba, departament of Cuzco.

The member is named Bailon. He is 32 years old and in a common law marriage. He has 1 son. His main activity is artisanal craft. He also has crop land where he grows corn, potatoes and more. He has worked in artisanal crafts since 2008. He makes his own designs as well as Andean designs. He wants to be given the loan to be able to buy paint, oils, watercolors, frames, an aerograph and brushes. The member works with the other members of the bank in the artisanal fair of the town of Chinchero. He will use the loan to invest in buying paint, oils, brushes, an aerograph and more.  

The member is happy with the loan and committed to making the payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying paint, oils, brushes, and an aerograph, among other things.

loans.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
Maria Cleofe, tiene 35 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real distrito de Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Maria Cleofe es mujer que busca el bienestar de su familia y aprovecha de las pocas oportunidades que se le presentan en la vida,  ella se dedica a la venta de leche y a vender la rica chicha. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Maria Cleofe en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería y para comprar un animal. 

Maria Cleofe pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria Cleofe is 35 years old. She has two children and lives in the community of Tambo Real, district of Anta of the departament of Cuzco. Maria Cleofe is a woman who seeks her family's wellbeing and takes advantage of the few opportunities that are presented in her life. She sells milk and chicha. She has had this business for several years and it is going well for her thanks to her hard work. Maria Cleofe at this time requires the loan to buy merchandise and to buy an animal.  

Maria Cleofe belongs to the “San Bartolomé de Tambo Real” community bank of the Asociación Arariwa and she is grateful for the opportunity offered in this way. She is also committed to making the payment according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to buy an animal

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana Maria, tiene 32 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real distrito de Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Ana Maria es mujer que busca el bienestar de su familia y aprovecha de las pocas oportunidades que se le presentan en la vida,  ella se dedica a la venta de leche. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Ana Maria en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para sus vacas lecheras.  

Ana Maria pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolomé de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is 32 years old, has 2 children and lives in the Tambo Real community, Anta district, Cusco department. Member Ana Maria looks out for the well-being of her family and takes advantage of the small opportunities that life presents to her. Ana Maria sells milk and has done so for many years, and the business is going well, thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Ana Maria requires this loan to purchase feed for her dairy cows.

Ana Maria belongs to the communal bank 'San Bartolomé de Tambo Real', part of the Arariwa Association, and is thankful for the opportunity given to her. She promises to make the repayments according to the specified time period.

loans.use: To purchase feed for dairy cows.

loans.name: Jose Wiliam

texts.es:
José, tiene 46 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, nació en la ciudad del Cusco y ahora vive en la misma ciudad. José tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de productos alimenticios en base a plantas medicinales como por ejemplo kiwicha, maca, yacon y otros más. José en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar una maquina procesadora de productos alimenticios o suplementarios.

José pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: José is 46 years old, has 2 children, and was born in Cusco city, where he nows lives. He has a small business selling health products made from medicinal plants such as kiwicha, maca, yacon and others. José requires a loan to purchase a processing machine to make health products and supplements. He belongs to the communal bank 'Inti Pakareq', part of the Arariwa Association, and is thankful for the opportunity granted to him. He promises to make the repayments according to the specified time period.

loans.use: To purchase a processing machine to make health products and supplements.

loans.name: Lucy Gladys

texts.es:
Lucy, tiene 66 años de edad, tiene tres hijos, nació en la ciudad del Arequipa y ahora vive en la ciudad del Cusco.  Lucy tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de productos alimenticios en base a plantas y hierbas medicinales. Lucy en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos como por ejemplo maca. 

Lucy pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Lucy is 66 years old and has 3 children. She was born in the city of Arequipa and now lives in the city of Cusco. Lucy has a small business selling plant-based food products and herbal medicines. Lucy needs the loan to buy more products, such as maca. [Translator's note: maca is a peruvian root grown for its nutritional, medicinal, and reputed aphrodisiac value.]

Lucy belongs to the “Inti Pakareq” communal bank, part of the Arariwa Association. She is grateful for the opportunity offered in this way and promises to make her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: To buy more products, e.g. maca (a peruvian root grown for its nutritional and medicinal value).

loans.name: Ruth Julieta

texts.es:
Ruth, tiene 53 años de edad, tiene un hijo, nació en la ciudad de Cusco y actualmente vive en la misma ciudad. Ruth es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que se dedica a la confección de ropa en maquina de tejer. Ya son 25  años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ruth en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de costura como por ejemplo hilos, telas y otras cosas más.

Ruth pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Ruth, 53, has a son.  She was born in the city of Cusco and still lives in the same city.  Ruth is a hard working, enterprising woman who manufactures clothing using a knitting machine.  She’s been in this business for 25 years now and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it.  On this occasion, Ruth needs a loan to buy sewing supplies like thread and fabric, among other things.

Ruth is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Inti Pakareq” communal bank and she is grateful for the opportunity provided through this means.  At the same time, she commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy sewing supplies like thread, fabric and many other things.

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es:
Eloy, tiene 41 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, nació en la ciudad de Cusco y actualmente vive en la misma ciudad. Eloy es albañil y trabaja de forma independiente, él realiza los trabaja a todo costo y después de terminar la obra cobra por la mano de obra y por los materiales que utilizó. Eloy en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como por ejemplo cemento, pintura, madera, clavos, focos y otras cosas más. El sueño de Eloy es abrir una empresa constructora.     

Eloy pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Eloy is 41 years old and has two children. He was born in the city of Cusco where he still lives. Eloy is a brick mason and works independently. He covers all the costs of a construction project, then collects for labor and materials when the work is done.

Eloy requires a loan to buy construction materials such as cement, paint, lumber, nails, and lights. His dream is to one day have his own construction company.

Eloy belongs to the “Inti Pakareq” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa. He is grateful for the opportunity provided by this organization, and promises to make his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro, tiene 56 años de edad, tiene tres hijos, nació en el departamento de Madre de Dios y actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Alejandro es carpintero y trabaja de forma independiente, él tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería en su domicilio donde fabrica muebles de madera como por ejemplo roperos, camas, sillas y salas.  Alejandro en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo laca, madera, clavos, tela, cola de carpintero, lijas y otras cosas más. El sueño de Alejandro es que el taller crezca cada día más. 

Alejandro pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 56 years old and has three children. He was born in the department of Madre de Dios and currently lives in Cusco. Alejandro is a carpenter and works independently. He has a small workshop in his home where he builds wooden furniture, such as closets, beds, chairs, and living room sets. 

At this time, Alejandro needs a loan to buy materials such as lacquer, wood, nails, cloth, glue, and sandpaper. His dream is for his workshop to grow larger every day. 

Alejandro belongs to the “Inti Pakareq” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa. He is grateful for the opportunity provided by this organization, and promises to make his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his workshop

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes, tiene 55 años D. edad, tiene tres hijos, nació en la ciudad del Cusco y ahora vive en misma ciudad.  Mercedes tiene una pequeña tienda D. lavandería y tintorería llamada “América” y está ubicada en la Plaza D. Arnas D. San Francisco. Mercedes en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo detergentes, blanqueadores y tintes. 

Mercedes pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” D. la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 55 years old and has three children.  She was born in the city of Cusco and lives there now.  Mercedes has a small laundry and dry cleaning business called 'América' which is located in main square in San Francisco.  Mercedes needs this loan to buy supplies such as detergents, bleaches and dyes.

Mercedes belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Inti Pakareq' community bank.  She is grateful for the opportunity she is being given with this loan and she pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as detergents, bleaches and dyes

loans.name: Monica

texts.es:
Mónica, tiene 41 años de edad, tiene un hijo, nació en la ciudad del Cusco y ahora vive en la misma ciudad. Monica es una mujer carismática y emprendedora que trabaja de forma independiente, ella tiene una pequeña agencia de viajes llamada “Argos Travel” donde brinda servicios de turismo para visitar y conocer el Valle Sagrado, Machupicchu y otras zonas arqueológicas del Imperio Incaico, Cusco, Perú.  Mónica en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pasajes aéreos y otras cosas más.

Mónica pertenece al banco comunal “Inti Pakareq” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mónica is 41 years old and has one child.  She was born in the city of Cusco and lives there now.  Mónica is a charismatic and enterprising woman who works for herself.  She owns a small travel agency called 'Argos Travel' where she provides tourism services for people visiting el Valle Sagrado (The Sacred Valley), Machupicchu and other archaeological sites of the Incan Empire in Cusco, Peru.  Mónica needs this loan to buy plane tickets and other items.

Mónica is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Inti Pakareq" community bank.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given with this loan and she pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy plane tickets and some other items

loans.name: Richar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA VICTORIA - CHINCHERO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Richar; El socio tiene 32 años de edad, el socio  es soltero; el socio tiene 2 hijos; (12,7) años de edad, el socio tiene como principal actividad la artesanía pero también él  se dedica  a la compra y venta de vehículos,  en cuanto a la artesanía el socio produce, mantas, tejidos con motivos andinos, en sus diseños plasman las vivencias del ande , recreando paisajes con, animales típicos, flores nativas, cerros, aves y el bello sol azul que caracteriza el ande peruano. El socio desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mantas y tejidos, el socio compra a los típicos artesanos y él los vende en la feria artesanal en el pueblo de Chinchero.  

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Richar is a member of the "Nueva Victoria - Chincero" community bank which is located in Chinchero district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco Department.

Richar is 32 years old, single, and has 2 children aged 12 and 7.  His main business activity is handicrafts but he also buys and sells vehicles.  As regards his handicrafts, he produces blankets and embroideries with Andean motifs.  Experiences of the Andes are captured in his designs, recreating landscapes with typical animals, native flowers, hills, birds and the beautiful blue sun that characterizes the Peruvian Andes.

Richar requires this loan to invest in buying blankets and embroideries.  He buys from traditional craftsmen and sells at a craft fair in the town of Chinchero.

Richar is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying blankets and embroideries

loans.name: Jesus Alipio

texts.es:
Jesús, tiene 23 años de edad, tiene un hijo y vive en la Capital Arqueológica de América,  Cusco – Perú.  Jesús es hombre que busca aprovecha las oportunidades que se le presenta en la vida, él trabaja brindando servicio de transporte en la ciudad del Cusco y trabaja de día o de noche. Jesús también tiene un pequeño negocio de familiar de crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas.  Ya es un año que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Jesús en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes y gallinas. 

Jesús pertenece al banco comunal “Allin Muju” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Jesús is 23 years old.  He has one child and lives in the archaeological capital of America (Cusco, Peru).  Jesús is a man who seeks to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves in life.  He provides a transport service in the city of Cusco and works days or nights.  Jesús also owns a small family business raising animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  He has been in this business for one year and it is doing very well.  On this occasion, he requires a loan to buy guinea pigs and hens.

Jesús is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Allin Muju" community bank.  He is grateful for the opportunity he is being given with this loan and he pledges to make his repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and hens

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria, tiene 22 años de edad, tiene un hijo y vive en la Capital Arqueológica de América,  Cusco – Perú. 

Victoria tiene un carro y lo alquila a S/. 25 soles a personas que desean trabajar brindando servicios de transporte. Ya es un año que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Victoria en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para mantenimiento del carro. 

Victoria pertenece al banco comunal “Allin Muju” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Victoria is 22 years old and has one child.  She lives in the archaeological capital of America (Cusco, Peru).

Victoria has a car which she hires out for 25 Peruvian soles to people who want to use it to provide transport services.  She has been in this business for one year and it is doing very well.  On this occasion, Victoria requires a loan to have her car serviced.

Victoria is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Allin Muju" community bank.  She is grateful for the opportunity she is being given with this loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to have her car serviced

loans.name: Yolanda Fabiola

texts.es:
Yolanda, tiene 42 años de edad, tiene tres hijos y vive en la Capital Arqueológica de América,  Cusco – Perú. Yolanda es técnica en enfermería y no tiene trabajo pero está postulando para ESSALUD de la ciudad el Cusco. Yolanda tiene una pequeña librería y tiene una variedad de útiles de escritorio. Ya son varios meses que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Yolanda en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar útiles escolares porque se está acercando campaña escolar.  

Yolanda pertenece al banco comunal “Allin Muju” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 42 years old and has three children.  She lives in the archaeological capital of America (Cusco, Peru).  Yolanda is a nurse.  She doesn't have a job but she is applying to ESSALUD in the city of Cusco.

Yolanda owns a small bookstore and sells a variety of stationery products.  She has been in this business for several months and it is doing very well.  On this occasion, Yolanda requires a loan to buy school supplies because the new school year is approaching.

Yolanda is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Allin Muju" community bank.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given with this loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Pascual Frank

texts.es:
Pascual, tiene 45 años de edad, tiene un hijo y vive en la Capital Arqueológica de América,  Cusco – Perú.  Pascual es licenciado en Enfermería y pertenece al Ministerio de Salud específicamente trabaja en el área administrativa del hospital Regional del Cusco.  Pascual también tiene un pequeño negocio de crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes. Pascual en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para el mejoramiento de la raza de los cuyes. 

Pascual pertenece al banco comunal “Allin Muju” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Pascual is 45 years old and has one child.  He lives in the archaeological capital of America (Cusco, Peru).

Pascual has a degree in nursing and works for the Ministry of Health.  He works in administration in Cusco Regional Hospital.  Pascual also owns a small business raising small animals such as guinea pigs.  On this occasion, he needs a loan to improve the breed of his guinea pigs.

Pascual is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Allin Muju" community bank.  He is grateful for the opportunity he is being given with this loan and pledges to make his repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to improve the breed of his guinea pigs

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose tiene 25 años de edad, es casado y tiene un hijo dependiente a su cargo. Actualmente, vive en el caserío Punto Nueve - Cruz de Chalpon, situado 10 minutes de la ciudad de Lambayeque.

Se gana la vida desde hace dos años criando y vendiendo animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio. El suele criar ganado porcino y cuando éstos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive. Aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro.  Su negocio cuenta con competencia en la región pero también cuenta con un amplio mercado para su comercialización.

Desea invertir su crédito en la compra de alimento balanceado para sus cerdos grandes y alimento de engorde y crecimiento para sus lechones. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternative un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles. Jose es  honesto y trabajador. Su mayor anhelo es lograr que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose, age 25, is married and has one dependent child under his care.  He lives in Punto Nueve – Cruz de Chalpon.  It is a rural community, which is situated ten minutes from the city of Lambayeque.

For two years he has earned a living selling small animals.  They are in pens in back of his house.  He generally raises pigs.  When they have reached a good level of development, he sells them to the merchants who always visit the area where he lives.  He learned this activity from his parents.  That is to say that he knows this line of work to perfection.  His business has competition in the region, but he also has ample merchandise to sell.

He wishes to use the loan to pay for balanced feed for his large pigs.  He also wants to buy food to fatten his piglets and to make them grow.

Therefore, he believes it is advisable to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  Jose is honest and hard-working.  His greatest desire is to make sure that his family has a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA VICTORIA - CHINCHERO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Hugo; El socio tiene 36 años de edad, el socio  es soltero; el socio tiene 3 hijos; (12,10,1 año y 8 meses) de edad, el socio tiene como principal actividad la agricultura, a esto el socio a decidido trabajar desde el 2008 en transporte turístico, debido a que Chinchero es una zona altamente visitada por turistas de todas partes del mundo, el socio ha hecho mucho esfuerzo para poder obtener su unidad vehicular y sacar su licencia para conducir en el servicio turístico y brindar transporte, el socio también se ha integrado a la empresa de transportes Sayhua tours que recoge turistas desde Cusco y todo el valle sagrado. El socio apoya a su conyugue en la elaboración y producción de la artesanía, el socio en esta ocasión nos comenta que él quiere hacerle el mantenimiento respectivo a su vehículo y venderlo, el requiere este crédito para poder aumentar al capital que genere la venta de su vehículo. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar un nuevo carro.

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Hugo is a member of the "Nueva Victoria - Chinchero" community bank which is located in Chinchero district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Hugo is 36 years old, single, and has three children aged 12, 10, 1 and 8 months.  His main business activity is farming.  In 2008 he decided to start work transporting tourists since Chinchero is an area that receives a lot of tourists from all parts of the world.  Hugo worked hard to afford his vehicle and obtain his license to drive and provide tourist transport services.  He is a part of the Sayhua Tours transport company that transports tourists from Cusco and the whole 'Valle Sagrado' (Sacred Valley).  Hugo also supports his wife in making and producing handicrafts.

On this occasion, Hugo tells us that he would like to have some maintenance work done on his vehicle and sell it.  He needs this loan to increase the capital that he will make from the sale of his vehicle.  He is requesting this loan to buy a new car.

Hugo is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy a new car

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell during the back-to-school season

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan tiene 38 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Vive en casa propia la cual está ubicada en la parte rural del distrito de Túcume en la región de Lambayeque. 

Desde hace tres años, Juan se dedica a la animación de fiestas sociales para la cual posee equipo de sonido propio. Actualmente, dirige el negocio de su domicilio. No hay mejor competencia en la zona porque conoce a la perfección el rubro y cuenta con una clientela ya establecida en la zona.

Desea invertir su crédito en la compra de dos parlantes para brindar mejor servicio a sus clientes. Con más equipo, espera poder generar más ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Juan is 38 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives in his own home which is located in the rural part of Túcume district, in Lambayeque region.

For three years Juan has been providing entertainment services at parties, for which he owns his own sound equipment.  He currently runs his business from home.  There is no better competition in the area because he knows his field well and has an established customer base in the area.

Juan would like to invest his loan in buying two speakers so that he can provide his customers with a better service.  With more equipment, he hopes to be able to make more income and consequently improve his quality of life.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy two speakers

loans.name: Antonio Abad

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA VICTORIA - CHINCHERO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Antonio; El socio tiene 56 años de edad, el socio  es casado; el socio tiene 4 hijos; (todos independientes) el socio tiene como principal artesanal, el socio se dedica al arte el realiza bellos trabajos en bastidores, se encarga de la textil ería y plasma la bella naturaleza andina, el socio es considerado un artista paisajista, el realiza bellos cuadros y textiles muy coloridos. La sobras del socio se pueden encontrar en el mercado artesanal de Chinchero. El socio desea comprar materiales como oleo, pinturas, bastidores, pinceles y otros. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales. 

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Here is a member who belongs to the communal bank named "Nueva Victoria-Chinchero". It is located in the district of Chinchero, in the Urubamba province of the department of Cusco.

His name is Antonio. His is 56 years old and he is married. He has 4 children who are independent. He is an artisan and he makes beautiful paintings. He makes textiles which caputre the nature of the Andes. He considers himself to be a landscape artist, painting beautiful and very colorful paintings and textiles. His art work can be found in the artisan's market in Chinchero. He wishes to purchase materials such as oil, paints, canvasses, paint brushes, and others.  He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of materials.

He is happy with the loan which was granted to him and he is committed to making payments at the established times.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as oil, paints, canvasses, and paint brushes

loans.name: Mario Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar tiene cinco hijos y vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. Cesar es  agricultor y ganadero, el tiene pequeñas chacras donde siembra tubérculos, verduras y frutas, él también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros pequeños animales que sirven para el consumo de la familia o para vender. Cesar en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar fertilizante, semillas entres otras cosas. 

Cesar pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Cesar has five children and he lives in the community of San Isidro de Chicon, located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, in Cusco, Peru. Cesar is an agriculturist and farmer. He has small plots of land where he grows tubers, vegetables and fruits. He also raises small livestock, such as guinea pigs, chickens, pigs, and other small animals that are for the family’s consumption or to sell. Cesar requires a loan to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other items.

Cesar belongs to the communal bank named "Los Dinamicos de San Isidro de Chicon", in association with Arariwa (Kiva Field Partner).  He is thankful for the opportunity provided to him by this means and he is committed to making payments at the established times.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
Leonarda tiene  31 años, es casada y junto con su familia vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon las personas se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Leonarda tiene pequeñas chacras donde siembra tubérculos, verduras y frutas, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros pequeños animales que sirven para el consumo de la familia o para vender. Leonarda en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar comida para los animales como pastos y vitaminas. 

Leonarda pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Leonarda is 31 years old, married, and she lives together with her family in the community of San Isidro de Chicon, located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, in Cusco, Peru. In the community of Chicon the population is dedicated to farming and agriculture. Leonarda has some land where she grows tubers, vegetables and fruit. She also raises small livestock such as guinea pigs, poultry, pigs, and other small animals that are for the family's consumption or to sell. Leonarda requires this loan to purchase feed for her livestock, such as hay and vitamins.

Leonarda is a member of the communal bank named "Los Dinamicos de San Isidro de Chicon", in association with Arariwa (Kiva Field Partner). She is thankful for the opporutnity provide to her by this means and she is committed to making payments at the established times.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed such as hay and vitamins

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Lucilo

texts.es:
Lucilo tiene 52 años y es casado. Vive con su esposa, seis de sus nueve hijos y un nieto. Vive en casa propia en el distrito de Colasay en el departamento de Cajamarca, a más de seis horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Su casa es hecha de material rústico y no cuenta con servicios básicos como luz o agua. La única fuente de agua es la que obtiene de una pequeña vertiente que pasa por su terreno.

Gana su vida dedicándose al cultivo de café, maíz, menestras y yuca. Entre los meses de abril y junio, proyecta cosechar 10 quintales de café, 15 quintales de menestras y 20 quintales de maíz. Además, cuenta con dos vacas que cría en terreno cerca de su domicilio. Cuenta con 20 años de experiencia en estos rubros.

Desea invertir una parte de su crédito en el abono de su finca de café y otra parte para la siembra de 5 mil plantones de café en un área que está preparando. Para lograr su meta, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Lucilo is 52 years old and he is married. He lives with his wife and six of their nine children and a grandson. He lives in his own house in the district of Colasay, in the department of Cajamarca. It is located more than six hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. His house is made of very rustic materials and he doesn't have basic services such as hydro and water. His only source of water is from a small stream that passes through his land.

His earns his living by cultivating coffee, corn, beans, and yuca. Between the months of April  and June he expects to harvest 10 quintals of coffee, 15 quintals of beans, and 20 quintals of  corn. Additionally, he has two cows which he keeps in some land near his house. He has 20 years’ experience in these businesses.

He wishes to invest a part of his loan in the purchase of fertilizer for his coffee plantation,  and another part will be used to plant five thousand coffee seedlings in a piece of land he is  readying. In order to reach his goal he has approached Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and to plant coffee

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime tiene  30 años y es casado, él y su familia viven en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon los pobladores se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Jaime se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros pequeños animales que sirven para el consumo de la familia o para vender. Jaime en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar comida para los animales como pastos y vitaminas. 

Jaime pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Jaime is 30 years old and he is married. He and his family live in the community of San Isidro de chicon, located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, in Cusco, Peru. The population of the community of Chicon is dedicated to farming and agriculture. Jaime raises small livestock such as guinea pigs, poultry, pigs, and other small animals that are for the family's consumption or to sell. Jaime requires a loan to purchase feed for his livestock, such as hay and vitamins.

Jaime belongs to the communal bank "Los Dinamicos de San Isidro de Chicon", an association of Arariwa (Kiva Field Partner). He is thankful for the opportunity given to him by this means and he is committed to making payments at the established times.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed such as hay and vitamins.

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Forferio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA VICTORIA - CHINCHERO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Forferio; El socio tiene 73 años de edad, el socio  es casado; el socio tiene 6 hijos; (todos independientes) el socio tiene como principal artesanía, el socio nació y creció en el bello valle sagrado y  es considerado en todo el poblado como uno de los pintores de expresión paisajista andina más reconocidos y antiguos, actualmente el socio sigue elaborando trabajos perfectos en oleo, el socio plasma las vivencias andinas, aquí está expuesto todo el vivir diario de la gente andina, los valores, la ideología, el trabajo y mucho más, el socio participo en documentales de la national geography, el socio estuvo en agosto del 2010 representando y de invitado en el suizo hotel en Lima, el fue invitado por el ministerio de turismo a exponer junto a su hija sus trabajos,  El socio tiene su stand en Awanawasi, está en el mismo poblado de Chincheros y el muy gustoso de que pronto vengan a visitarlo de todas partes del mundo para contar la historia de su pueblo, el socio es una persona muy carismática y sencilla, lleno de tanto talento. El socio solicita el préstamo para poder comprar su materiales, el requiere pinceles, bastidores, oleos, marcos. El socio solicita el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de materiales para sus cuadros y pinturas.  

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Forferio, 73, is a member of the “NUEVA VICTORIA-CHINCHERO” (New Victory-Chinchero) communal bank located in Chinchero district in Urubamba province, Cusco department.

He’s married and has six children (all independent).  He is an artisan.  He was born and grew up in the beautiful Valle Sagrado and is considered in the whole town as one of the most recognized and longstanding landscape painter.  He is currently painting perfect works in oil.  He represents Andean scenes depicting everyday life of Andean people: their values, ideologies, work and much more.  He participated in National Geographic documentaries and in August, 2010 was invited to exhibit his and his daughter’s work in Lima’s Suizo Hotel by the Minister of Tourism.

He has his stand in Awanawasi which is also in the town of Chincheros.  He would be very happy if people from all over the world were to come visit him soon so that he can tell his town’s history to them.  He is a very charismatic, low-key person who is full of talent.

He is asking for a loan to buy supplies he needs: brushes, canvases, oil paint and frames.  He is asking for the loan in order to buy materials for his paintings. He is happy with the granted loan and pledges to repay in a timely manner.

loans.use: To purchase materials for his paintings.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia tiene  31 años y vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon los pobladores se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Alicia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros pequeños animales que sirven para el consumo de la familia o para vender. También Alicia se dedica a la venta de granos secos. Alicia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar para animales menores. 

Alicia pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Alicia is 31 years old and lives in San Isidro de Chicón which is located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, Cusco, Perú.  Chicón’s residents are mostly farmers and raise livestock.  Alicia raises small farm animals like: guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and other small animals which are for her family’s consumption or to sell.  She also sells dry grains.  On this occasion Alicia needs the loan to buy small farm animals.

Alicia is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicón” (San Isidro de Chicón’s Dynamic Ones) communal bank and she is grateful for the opportunity she’s been given through this means and she also commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy small farm animals.

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia tiene tres hijos y vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon los pobladores se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Antonia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia, ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros pequeños animales que sirven para el consumo de la familia. Antonia requiere el microcrédito para comprar animales y para comprar alimento. 

Antonia pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Antonia has three children and lives in the community of San Isidro de Chicón located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, Cusco, Perú.  Chicón’s residents are mostly farmers and raise livestock.  

Antonia is a hard working, enterprising woman who supports her family.  She raises small farm animals like guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and other small animals that are used for her family’s consumption.  Antonia needs the microloan to buy animals and to buy feed.

Antonia is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicón” (San Isidro de Chicón’s Dynamic Ones) communal bank and she is grateful for the opportunity provided by this means; she also commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy animals and to buy feed.

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria 29 años y es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que busca el bienestar de su familia, ella trabaja en la chacra y haciendo las actividades del hogar, ella vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon los pobladores se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Maria se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros pequeños animales que sirven para el consumo de la familia. Maria requiere el microcrédito para comprar animales y para comprar alimento para cuyes como pasto. 

Maria pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
María, 29, is an enterprising, hard working woman seeking her family’s wellbeing. She works her fields and does her household chores.  She lives in the community of San Isidro de Chicón located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, Cusco, Perú.  Chicón’s residents are mostly farmers and raise livestock.  She raises small farm animals like guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and other small animals that are used for her family’s consumption.  María needs the microloan to buy animals and to buy feed, like grass, for the guinea pigs.

María is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicón” (San Isidro de Chicón’s Dynamic Ones) communal bank and she is grateful for the opportunity provided by this means; she also commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy animals and to buy guinea pig feed.

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Modesta

texts.es:
Modesta tiene 57 años y es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que busca el bienestar de su familia, ella trabaja en la chacra, en el hogar y en su pequeña chichería, ella vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon los pobladores se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Modesta se dedica a la venta de chicha, siembra tubérculos, hortalizas, verduras y también se cría animales menores como cuyes, gallinas y chanchos.  Modesta requiere el microcrédito para comprar jora. 

Modesta pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Modesta, 57, is an enterprising, hard working woman seeking her family’s wellbeing. She works her fields, does her household chores and tends to her small chichería (shop selling chicha-a drink made from fermented corn).  She lives in the community of San Isidro de Chicón located 15 minutes from the city of Urubamba, Cusco, Perú.  Chicón’s residents are mostly farmers and raise livestock.  

Modesta raises small farm animals like guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and other small animals and also sells chicha and farms tubers, leafy green vegetables and vegetables.  Modesta needs the microloan to buy jora (a type of chicha).

Modesta is a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicón” (San Isidro de Chicón’s Dynamic Ones) communal bank and she is grateful for the opportunity provided by this means; she also commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy jora.

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria tiene 59 años y es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que busca el bienestar de su familia, ella realiza las actividades del hogar y en su pequeña tienda de abarrotes, ella vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. En la comunidad de Chicon los pobladores se dedican a la ganadería y agricultura. Gregoria se dedica a la venta de comestibles como por ejemplo azúcar, fideos, arroz, pan y otras cosas más. Gregoria en esta oportunidad requiere el microcrédito para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo gaseosas, arroz, azúcar y otras cosas más. 

Gregoria pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
59-year old Gregoria is a hardworking, enterprising woman who is always seeking the wellbeing of her family. She takes care of the household and also runs a small grocery store. She lives in the community of San Isidro de Chicon which is located 15 minutes from the town of Urubamba, Cusco, Peru. The people of the community earn their living by raising animals or working in agriculture. 

Gregoria sells groceries such as sugar, pasta, rice, bread etc. She is seeking a loan to buy more items such as soft drinks, rice, and sugar. She belongs to the Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon community bank, a part of the Arariwa Association. She is grateful for the chance to obtain a loan and promises to pay it back according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy more stock such as soft drinks, rice, and sugar

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es:
Hilario tiene 42 años y es un padre emprendedor y trabajador que busca el bienestar de su familia, él tiene trabajos eventuales pero en su casa tiene un galpón donde cría animales menores como cuyes. Como todos los pobladores de San Isidro de Chicon se dedican a la ganadería y a la agricultura nuestros socio no es la excepción, él vive en la Comunidad de San Isidro de Chicon que se encuentra ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Urubamba, Cusco – Perú. Hilario en esta oportunidad requiere el microcrédito para comprar animales menores como cuyes y otros. 

Hilario pertenece al banco comunal “Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
42-year old Hilario is a hardworking, enterprising man always looking out for the wellbeing of his family. He works on a casual basis and also has a shed at home where he raises animals such as guinea pigs. The people of the community earn their living by raising animals or working in agriculture, and Hilario is no exception. He lives in the community of San Isidro de Chicon which is located 15 minutes from the town of Urubamba, Cusco, Peru.

Hilario is seeking a loan to buy animals such as young guinea pigs and other species. He belongs to the Los Dinámicos de San Isidro de Chicon community bank, a part of the Arariwa Association. He is grateful for the chance to obtain a loan and promises to pay it back according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy animals such as young guinea pigs

location.town: San Isidro de Chicon- Urubamba - Cusco

loans.name: Alishba's Group

texts.en:
Alishba, 50, has applied for a loan for her husband’s business.  Married, her family lives in a three room house in Kot Radha Kishan, Pakistan, a city famous for its dairy industry.

Alishba stays at home and does household work.  Alishba and her husband have two illiterate sons who work.  Her eldest has a job in a factory while her youngest helps his father in his crushed wood selling business.
  
Due to good customer service, her husband receives a lot of orders every month.  Alishb's husband, in business for over eight years, wants to buy crushed woods in bulk to fulfill larger orders on time and to earn a good profit.  She hoped this loan will boost the family business.

There are four other members of this group loan.

loans.use: To buy crushed woods for selling

loans.name: Silvino

texts.en:
Silvino F. is from the village of Lantungan, Aurora Zamboanga Del Sur. He is 59 years old, and married, with 5 adult-aged children. To make a living, Silvino sells wood and wood-related products. Silvino has been engaged in his business for more than 12 years and earns approximately 12500 PHP a month.

Silvino joined GDMPC this year to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Silvino is requesting his first loan, for 40000 PHP, to be used to invest in expanding the business. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve his family's living conditions. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fishers and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Seema's Group

texts.en:
Seema is 26 years old and married, with 3 children. She lacks an education: She always wanted to go to school but wasn't able to do this due to her parents' poor financial condition.
.  
Her husband, M. B., has a milk-selling business. He gets milk from his own buffaloes which he keeps at his home.  He has a good number of clients in his area who purchase milk from him due to its freshness and good quality
  
Seema is an embroidery expert. She learned the art of embroidery from her mother. She takes regular orders from her neighboring clients and charges a very reasonable amount to produce quality work. 

The family lives in the small city of Kot Radha Kishan in Pakistan. Kot Radha Kishan is famous for its dairy industry. Seema owns a small single-room house there and she has been living in it for more than five years.
 
Seema has applied for a loan for the first time from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband. With the loan, he will buy another buffalo which will help him to increase his milk production and to serve many more clients in his area. Seema is confident that with the loan investment, her husband’s household income will be increased and she will be able to send her elder daughter, who is now 6 years old, to school.

loans.use: To buy another buffalo for dairy business

loans.name: Kenanga Indah Group

texts.en:
Ni Komang A. S., as well as all the members of the Kenanga Indah Group, is getting her second loan. Ni Komang A. S. plans to buy four pigs and also feed if there is an excess of the loan money added to her own capital.

To support the family income, in addition to raising pigs every day, Ni Komang A. S. sells snacks. Her husband is a driver. Every day she spends 15,000 for the needs of the kitchen (food) and Rp. 125,000 to pay for electricity and water.

loans.use: to buy four pigs

loans.name: Dina Esperanza

texts.es: Dina Esperanza P. T., es una persona que durante años ha trabajado muy duro por sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, ya que ella es madre soltera. Reside junto a sus tres hijos de los cuales el mayor se dedica a trabajar a pesar de su corta edad, todo con el fin de ayudarle a su madre con los gastos del hogar. Dina vive en Aguilares, en el departamento de San Salvador, mismo lugar en el cual tiene su negocio. Ella trabaja de sol a sol elaborando tortillas en su hogar, lo cual realiza con mucho entusiasmo y deseo de salir adelante y contar con una vida mejor junto a su familia, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a Integral a través del cual pueda contar con el monto de dinero necesario para invertir en su negocio, surtiéndolo, de forma que cuente con más maíz, cal y gas propano para elaborar mayor cantidad de tortillas, de forma que sus ganancias crezcan y su economía mejore en gran manera.
texts.en:
Dina Esperanza P. T. is a person who has worked very hard for years in order to get her three children ahead.  She is a single mother.  She lives with her three children.  The oldest, in spite of his young age, works.  He does this to help his mother with the household expenses.  Dina lives in Aguilares in the San Salvador department.  That is also where she has her business.

She works from sunup until sundown making tortillas in her home.  She does this with much enthusiasm, the desire to get ahead, and the desire to have a better life together with her family.  

That is the reason she is requesting a loan from Integral.  With the loan she will be able to have the money she needs in invest in her business.  She will stock it with more corn, lime powder, and propane gas in order to make a greater quantity of tortillas.  This way her earnings will grow and her finances will greatly improve.

loans.use: To buy corn, lime powder, and propane gas to make tortillas

loans.name: Sughran's Group

texts.en:
Sughran has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to financially support her husband, who wants to improve his milk-selling business by purchasing another buffalo.  

Sughran lives in a 3 room brick house with her family in a small city called Kot Radha Kishen, which is located in Punjab, Pakistan, and famous for its dairy industry. She moved here with her family 15 years ago.

She is the mother of three sons and three daughters. All of them are illiterate because Sughran is unable to provide them with an education due to the family's poor financial situation. 

She is 42 years old and married to M. M.. M. has been in this business for more than six years and is well-known among his clients. He earns good profits from his business. He gets up early in the morning and milks his buffalo to sell the milk to his nearby clients. 

Sughran is hopeful that her husband will be able to make positive changes to his business by investing the loan in his business.

loans.use: To buy another buffalo for milk-selling business

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan, 28, is a married mother of two children ages 6 and 10 years who both attend school.  She has been practicing mixed farming for the last eight years and employs one farmhand.  Her farm produces milk, maize and eggs which are all sold locally.  She also owns a motorbike for transport services.

She has requested a loan of 30,000 KES through Juhudi Kilimo for poultry farming.  She says that the extra income from this loan will enable her to improve her family's livelihood.  In the future, she would like to increase the number of her chickens and also venture into dairy farming.

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen comes from Lahore which is Pakistan’s second largest city, known for its history and culture. She lives there in the area of Ismail Nagar with her family in a 2-room brick house. She moved here 30 years ago. She is the mother of two sons and two daughters. Her elder son works as a driver  while the others stay at home. Perveen is unable to provide her children an education due to financial constraints. 

She is married to S. M. who is also a driver and drives a 32-seat bus to provide transport services to the passengers. In order to financially support her family, Perveen sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She has been operating this business for the past 5 years and is an expert in her field. She receives a good number of orders every month due to the good quality of her work and her reasonable charges. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to improve her sewing business. With the loan, she will buy a new sewing machine because her old machine doesn’t produce quality work and takes much time to sew a single dress. The new machine will help her complete orders on time and earn more profits. 

She hopes that the loan will be a good investment for her business and she will be able to increase her monthly income which will help her with costs relative to the marriage of her eldest son who is now 25 years old. She is a new loan applicant of Asasah and hopes that it will be a profitable experience for her.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan C.  is 43 years old and married with three children whose ages range from 18 to 23. Two of the children are currently attending school.

Susan has a mixed farm in Kitale town, western Kenya, that produces milk, maize, beans and vegetables, which are all sold locally. She has been in the farming business for 20 years now and employs one farmhand. She mainly depends on the income from her farm to meet the basic needs of her family.

She has requested a loan of 31,200 KES through Juhudi Kilimo to purchase and insure a dairy cow. The extra income from this loan will enable her to pay school fees for her children and also provide for their basic needs. 

She hopes to venture into zero grazing in the next five years.

loans.use: To purchase and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia C. is from the village of Palilan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 42 years old. Sofia is married and has six school-aged children.

To make a living, Sofia plants and harvests rice for sale. Sofia has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month.

In 2007, Sofia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Sofia has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC. 

Sofia is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. This will be the third loan taken out by Sofia from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business. 

About GDMPC:
GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James S. is from the village of Poblacion, Pana-on, Misamis Occidental. He is 55 years old. James is married and has one grown child. 

To make a living, James owns and operates a tricycle transport service. He has been engaged in his business for over four years and earns approximately 2,500 PHP a month.

In 2008, James joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. James has successfully repaid a previous loan  from GDMPC. He is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This will be the fourth loan taken out by James from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand his business. 

About GDMPC:
GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.name: Rita's Group

texts.en:
Rita S. is from the village of De Vera, Cauayan City, Isabela. She is 34 years old. Rita is the leader of a seven-member group loan offered by ASKI. While each member of the group receives an individual loan, they are all collectively responsible for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults.

Rita is married and has four school-aged children. To make a living, Rita raising livestock, primarily chickens, for sale. Rita has been engaged in her business for over 13 years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month.

In 2011, Rita joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Rita is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase livestock feed and other supplies. This will be the first loan taken out by Rita from ASKI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income. 

About ASKI:
ASKI is one of the most successful microfinance institutions in the Philippines. It has 38 branches covering the Central and Northeastern areas. Its clients are mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase livestock feed and other supplies

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en:
Gertrudes L. is from the village of Talairon, Oroq.City. She is 70 years old. Gertrudes is married and has four adult children. 

To make a living, Gertrudes owns and operates general store. She has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 2,500 PHP a month.

In 2007, Gertrudes joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Gertrudes has successfully repaid a previous loan from GDMPC. Gertrudes is requesting a new loan of 45,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell like rice and corn grits, dried fish, canned goods, instant noodles, spices, softdrinks candies, bread and biscuits. This loan will be the 14th loan taken out by Gertrudes from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business. 

About GDMPC:
GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase rice and corn grits, dried fish, canned goods, instant noodles, spices, softdrinks candies, bread and biscuits.

She is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. This will be the fourth loan taken out by Lolita from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business. 

About GDMPC:
GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches  covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita O. is from the village of Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 59 years old. Lolita is widowed and has seven adult children. 

To make a living, Lolita weaves nipa palms into thatched mats that can be used for various purposes such as roofing. Lolita has been engaged in her business for over 23 years and earns approximately 2,400 PHP a month.

In 2011, Lolita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Lolita is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase raw materials to manufacture additional products. This will be the first loan taken out by Lolita from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business. 

About GDMPC:
GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.
